NSObject(TrigDetailDisplay) Class Reference

Category for transforming an object which is either a Browfile or a SSYRecurringDate to a human-readable display name or day name. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(NSString *) - triggerDetailDisplayName
 Returns a localized, human-readable expression of the receiver.

Detailed Description

Category for transforming an object which is either a Browfile or a SSYRecurringDate to a human-readable display name or day name.

This category is referenced in bindings in Bookshelf.nib.
